title: QOTSA - The Definitive Collection Of B-sides & Rarities (2007 -
description:
QUEENS OF THE STONE AGE
"The Definitive Collection Of B-sides & Rarities"

==============
DISC ONE
==============
01 - Spiders And Vinegaroons (Gamma Ray Sessions, 1995)
02 - Born To Hula (Gamma Ray Sessions, 1995)
03 - If Only Everything (Gamma Ray Sessions, 1995)
04 - Rickshaw (&#039;Plastic Turks&#039; Version, Recording Date Unknown / Possibly mid-1996)
05 - Give The Mule What He Wants (Demo, Recording Date Unknown)
06 - 18 A.D. (Previously Unreleased Song: &#039;Burn One Up Compilation&#039;, 1997)

10 - The Lost Art Of Keeping A Secret (Demo, Recording Date Unknown)
11 - Infinity (Previously Unreleased Song: &#039;Heavy Metal 2000&#039; Soundtrack, 2000)

14 - You&#039;re So Vague (Feel Good Hit Of The Summer CD Single - Bonus Disc Available On Rated R UK Edition, 2000)
15 - Who Will Be The Next In The Line (The Kinks Cover - Feel Good Hit Of The Summer CD Single - Bonus Disc Available On Rated R UK Edition, 2000)

Length: 66:05
==============

==============
DISC TWO
==============
01 - The Real Song For The Deaf (Songs For The Deaf Hidden Track, 2002)
02 - Gonna Leave You (Spanish Version - Songs For The Deaf Japanese Edition, 2002)

06 - The Most Exalted Potentate Of Love (The Cramps Cover - First It Giveth Single, 2003)
07 - The Fun Machine Took A Shit And Died (Previously Unreleased Song - 7" Vinyl Single, 2005)
08 - Precious And Grace (ZZ Top Cover - Lullabies To Paralyze Bonus Track, 2005)
09 - Infinity (New Version - Lullabies To Paralyze Bonus Track, 2005)
10 - Like A Drug (Desert Sessions Remake - Lullabies To Paralyze Bonus Track, 2005)
11 - Era Vulgaris (Free CD Single, 2007)
12 - Goin&#039; Out West (Tom Waits Cover - 3&#039;s & 7&#039;s Single, 2007)
13 - Christian Brothers (Elliott Smith Cover - Sick, Sick, Sick Single, 2007)
14 - White Wedding (Billy Idol Cover - Era Vulgaris Bonus Track, 2007)

17 - The Fun Machine Took A Shit And Died (New Version - Era Vulgaris Bonus Track, 2007)

==============

I got this one from mininova. It&#039;s a very good collection with a nice artwork.
